memberdef.argsstring: (Configuration conf, ClientPool< IMetaStoreClient, TException > metaClients, String catalogName, String databaseName, String tableName)
memberdef.name: MetastoreLock

detaileddescription.para: Creates a lock, retrying if possible on failure.

simplesect.para: The LockInfo object for the successfully created lock

parameterdescription.para: When we are not able to fill the hostname for lock creation, or there is an error during lock creation

detaileddescription.para: Search for the locks using HMSClient.showLocks identified by the agentInfo. If the lock is there, then a LockInfo object is returned. If the lock is not found null is returned.

simplesect.para: The LockInfo for the found lock, or null if nothing found
